languages.text: "Невозможно — вы меня раскусили". {n}Соломон поднимает бровь.{/n} "Я действительно на одну сотую процента менее равнодушен, чем выгляжу".
"Impossible — you've found me out." {n}Solomorne raises an eyebrow.{/n} "Yes, I am one hundredth of a percent less indifferent than I let on."
languages.original_text: "Невозможно — вы меня раскусили". {n}Соломон поднимает бровь.{/n} "Я действительно на одну сотую процента менее равнодушен, чем выгляжу".

traits.locale_text: "You've found me out? Impossible." {n}Solomorne raises an eyebrow.{/n} "Yes, I am a hundredth of a percent less indifferent than I let on."
"You've found me out? Impossible." {n}Solomorne raises an eyebrow.{/n} "Yes, I am a hundredth of a percent less indifferent than I let on."

"Impossible — you've found me out." {n}Solomorne raises an eyebrow.{/n} "Yes, I am one hundredth of a percent less indifferent than I let on."

languages.text: 「まさか…見破られてしまいましたか」{n}ソロモーンは片眉を上げた。{/n}「そうです。私は表に出しているよりも、ほんの少しだけ無関心ではないんです」
languages.original_text: "Impossible — you've found me out." {n}Solomorne raises an eyebrow.{/n} "Yes, I am one hundredth of a percent less indifferent than I let on."

traits.locale_text: 「まさか…見破られてしまいましたか」{n}ソロモーンは片眉を上げた。{/n}「そうです。私は表に出しているよりも、ほんの少しだけ無関心ではないんです」

languages.text: "Unmöglich – Ihr habt mich durchschaut." {n}Solomorne hebt eine Augenbraue.{/n} "Ja, ich bin etwa ein Hundertstel Prozent weniger gleichgültig, als ich zugebe."
languages.original_text: "Impossible — you've found me out." {n}Solomorne raises an eyebrow.{/n} "Yes, I am one hundredth of a percent less indifferent than I let on."

traits.locale_text: "Unmöglich – Ihr habt mich durchschaut." {n}Solomorne hebt eine Augenbraue.{/n} "Ja, ich bin etwa ein Hundertstel Prozent weniger gleichgültig, als ich zugebe."

languages.text: « Impossible. Vous m'avez démasqué, {n}vous répond Solomorne en haussant un sourcil.{/n} Oui, je ressens environ un pour cent d'indifférence de moins que ce que je cherche à vous laisser penser. »
languages.original_text: "Impossible — you've found me out." {n}Solomorne raises an eyebrow.{/n} "Yes, I am one hundredth of a percent less indifferent than I let on."

traits.locale_text: « Impossible. Vous m'avez démasqué, {n}vous répond Solomorne en haussant un sourcil.{/n} Oui, je ressens environ un pour cent d'indifférence de moins que ce que je cherche à vous laisser penser. »

languages.text: «¡Imposible! Me ha descubierto». {n}Solomorne arquea una ceja.{/n} «En efecto, soy una diezmilésima menos indiferente de lo que aparento».
languages.original_text: "Impossible — you've found me out." {n}Solomorne raises an eyebrow.{/n} "Yes, I am one hundredth of a percent less indifferent than I let on."

traits.locale_text: «¡Imposible! Me ha descubierto». {n}Solomorne arquea una ceja.{/n} «En efecto, soy una diezmilésima menos indiferente de lo que aparento».

languages.text: “真让人意外，居然被你看出来了。”{n}索罗蒙扬起一条眉毛。{/n}“没错，我比看起来要稍微温情一点点，百分之一吧。”
languages.original_text: "Impossible — you've found me out." {n}Solomorne raises an eyebrow.{/n} "Yes, I am one hundredth of a percent less indifferent than I let on."

traits.locale_text: “真让人意外，居然被你看出来了。”{n}索罗蒙扬起一条眉毛。{/n}“没错，我比看起来要稍微温情一点点，百分之一吧。”

languages.text: "İmkânsız. Yakalandım." {n}Solomorne bir kaşını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Evet, Glatio'yu göründüğümden yüzde bir daha fazla önemsiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Impossible — you've found me out." {n}Solomorne raises an eyebrow.{/n} "Yes, I am one hundredth of a percent less indifferent than I let on."

traits.locale_text: "İmkânsız. Yakalandım." {n}Solomorne bir kaşını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Evet, Glatio'yu göründüğümden yüzde bir daha fazla önemsiyorum."

languages.original_text: "Impossible — you've found me out." {n}Solomorne raises an eyebrow.{/n} "Yes, I am one hundredth of a percent less indifferent than I let on."
